lead_paragraph: While their limited-overs side have already savoured victories over the world's top sides, Bangladesh cricket hopes their narrow defeat to England over five days in Chittagong will be a watershed moment for the test team.

headline.print_headline: Bangladesh Hope Chittagong Marks a Test Turning Point
headline.main: Bangladesh Hope Chittagong Marks a Test Turning Point

snippet: While their limited-overs side have already savoured victories over the world's top sides, Bangladesh cricket hopes their narrow defeat to England over five days in Chittagong will be a watershed moment for the test team....
